TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MimeXmlBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension

Docs.summary: Represents an extensibility element added to a , an or an . It specifies the schema for XML messages that are not SOAP compliant. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `MimeXmlBinding` class.
